title: Did ancient Egypt have advanced technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not in the sense that that awful programme ancient aliens seem to show.If you want the truth they did not need the wheel,they had the pulley they used the the ramp to build the pyramids they had copper tools and stone they used hot water to break obelesks out of their bedrock,human power and boats to carry the quarried stone to the site where it is to be carved etc. There is a diary made by an old kingdom official who writes about his job ferrying and carting stones to the Great Pyramid its called the Diary of Merer it is the oldest papyri text in the world written 4,500 yrs ago at the time that the Great Pyramid was being built,read it.

This a question of constant debate. Some believe aliens brought advanced technology to build the pyramids. Others, discuss the many possible ways mankind could have constructed the pyramids. Some believe that there was a race of giants that built the pyramids. Whatever side you take, there is no definitive proof for any theory.
